---

I located the parent overview link rendering and hid it for the specified groups in both desktop and mobile menus.

- I added a small allowlist `HIDE_OVERVIEW_FOR = new Set(['Company', 'Legal'])` in `app/components/Navbar.tsx`.
- I updated the conditions so the overview link renders only when the parent label is not in that set.
- Touched both instances:
  - Desktop dropdown list under the parent group.
  - Mobile children view under the active parent.

You should now see no “Company overview” or “Legal overview” entry in their child menus, while other sections remain unchanged.
